com.agorapulse.gru

Class Squad

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.gru.Squad

  • public class Squad
extends Object
    Squad is pool of minions engaged in a test.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public <M extends Minion> void add(M minion)
        Adds a minion to the squad.
        Parameters:
        minion - minion who should join the squad

      • command

        public <M extends Minion> void command(Class<M> minionType,
                                       @DelegatesTo(type="M",strategy=1)
                                       groovy.lang.Closure aCommand)
        Command minion of given type. If the minion is not yet present in the squad it is instantiated using default constructor.
        Parameters:
        minionType - type of the minion being commanded
        aCommand - closure executed within context of selected minion

      • command

        public <M extends Minion> void command(Class<M> minionType,
                                       Command<M> command)
        Command minion of given type. If the minion is not yet present in the squad it is instantiated using default constructor.
        Parameters:
        minionType - type of the minion being commanded
        command - closure executed within context of selected minion

      • ask

        public <T,M extends Minion> T ask(Class<M> minionType,
                                  @DelegatesTo(type="M",strategy=1)
                                  groovy.lang.Closure<T> query)
        Asks minion of given type for something.
        Parameters:
        minionType - type of the minion being asked
        query - closure executed within context of selected minion which returns the result of this method
        Returns:
        result returned from the query closure or null if minion of given type is not present in the squad

      • ask

        public <T,M extends Minion> T ask(Class<M> minionType,
                                  Function<M,T> query)
        Asks minion of given type for something.
        Parameters:
        minionType - type of the minion being asked
        query - function executed with the selected minion which returns the result of this method
        Returns:
        result returned from the query closure or null if minion of given type is not present in the squad
